name: International Crimes Investigative Committee
title: Sentence Reiner Fuellmich As Harsh And Disproportionate As His Pre Trial Detention
content: ICIC auf DeutschVideosDr. Reiner FuellmichUnterstützung & SpendenÜber ICICKontaktImpressumDatenschutzerklärung Videos Dr. Reiner Fuellmich Unterstützung & Spenden Über ICIC Kontakt Impressum Datenschutzerklärung Videos Dr. Reiner Fuellmich Unterstützung & Spenden Über ICIC Kontakt Impressum Datenschutzerklärung ICIC US englishVideosDr. Reiner FuellmichSupport & donationsAbout ICICContactLegal disclosurePrivacy policy Videos Dr. Reiner Fuellmich Support & donations About ICIC Contact Legal disclosure Privacy policy Videos Dr. Reiner Fuellmich Support & donations About ICIC Contact Legal disclosure Privacy policy **🇺🇸** **Sentence Reiner Fuellmich as harsh and disproportionate as his pre-trial detention** Sentence Reiner Fuellmich as harsh and disproportionate as his pre-trial detention On Thursday 24 April, after a year-long criminal trial, which began in January 2024 and consisted of more than 50 court hearings, German lawyer and co-founder of Corona Investigative Committee (CIC), Dr Reiner Fuellmich, was sentenced to three-and-a-half years’ imprisonment, repayment of two allegedly embezzled sums of money (€200K and €500K) plus court fees.
